form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Notice of Final Naturalization Hearing, N-4 45A

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 U. S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service Notice of Final Naturalization Hearing Naturalization and Citizenship Branch 300 NORTH LOS ANGELES STREET File or A # 111 979 216 LOS ANGELES. CA 90012 Date 6/18/1987 Petition # 00685947 You are hereby notified to appear for a hearing on your petition for naturalization before a judge of the naturalization court at the DATE TIME, AND PLACE, SHOWN BELOW. Date 7/29/1987 DELIA DELGADO Time 8:00 AM 513 w SAXON AVE SAN GABRIEL CA 91776 Place LOS ANGELES CONVENT ION CENTER 1201 SOUTH FIGUEROA STREET LOS ANGELES, CA 90015 ROOM NUMBER: HALL You must bring the following with you: - This letter, with all of the QUESTIONS ON THE REVERSE side answered in ink or on a typewriter. - Alien Registration Card. - Rentry Permit, or Refugee Travel Document. - Any Immigration documents you may have. - If the naturalization hearing is ON BEHALF OF YOUR CHILD (children), BRING your CHILD (children). If you cannot come to this hearing, return this notice immediately and state why you cannot appear. In such case, please use the return address in the extreme upper left hand corner of this letter. You will be sent another notice of hearing at a later date. Form N-445A IMPORTANT - PLEASE SEE REVERSE
